sentence: Amazing views over looking the ocean
it was by the pool beach area with beautiful view
It was only like 80USD for a shaded giant bed that overlooks the ocean a nice distance from the busy sounds of the pool and includes lobster cevice a bottle of champagne and two 30minute massages
There was the loudest wedding ever right outside our room on the beach
We walked down the beach in both directions and I have to say this was the nicest stretch of beach by far
Excellent resort located on the beach with amazing customer service
There are so many other fabulous courteous staff the young ladies that greeted us for breakfast every morning at Kalmia pool and beach waiters housekeeping etc
Great location and the beach is beautiful
The pool side beach drink service was excellent
Room service prompt food delicious gorgeous beach comfortable cozy rooms nice Sandy beach and turquoise water can not wait until next time
we decided to upgrade our room for a ocean front view and did not regret this
Could use more umbrellas for shadeBeach nice clean white sand the most beautiful color of water I have ever seen
Speaking of pols they were awesome
We would recommend this hotel to anyone who is thinking about having a wedding by the beach just ask for Violeta and she will take care of everything
Room is standard I was at the 8th floor nice view of the lagoon there ’s a place a the 8th floor looking towards the ocean to take pictures

I booked a standard garden view submitted a request for higher floor with balcony about 15 weeks prior to arrival and was pleasantly surprised to receive a room on 6th floor Moon Tower with views of lagoon and ocean with balcony
I like to be in the pool and have an ocean view
We booked an ocean front room with two double beds
Food was pretty good especially the shrimp tacos by the beach I had those 4 out of the 5 days if they could get rid of those darn birds it would be heaven but I realize that can not happen
Not that generic crap that makes you sickThe beach and pools are clean and have many chairs
My husband worked out in the gym once we ran up down Kukulcan Blvd twice and walked the beach
My husband and I go to the beach at least once a year
Lastly the beach was beautiful and well maintained crystal clear water and no seaweed
We booked an oceanfront room
We had so much fun whether we were at the pool ocean ect
The beach was fantastic and there were more than half the chairs empty so finding chairs was never a worry
Breakfast outside at the palapa afforded fresh food and an oceanview table
We booked an ocean view not ocean front and the view from room 706 was breathtaking
Beach Restaurant Kambu
We spend 6 days and nights there and stayed in a double bed ocean view room
The beach outside the hotel is fantastic and the water is cristal clear blue when there is no seaweed
We were hesitant because it was our last day and wanted to spend time on the beach and he assured us they ’d try to make it quick
Everyone in my group had the lagoon view two double bed rooms
I Propsed to my fiance at one of their restaurants and also had dinner on the beach
The beach was also amazing though because it was windy the waves were really strong and my daughter did not enjoy it as much as me
Returning guests deserve a free massage dinner on the beach free hotel transfer anything
The room was beautiful although not the oceanfront I had requested I think they save those for members but was more than pleased with the room we got
In the morning when you wake up your are welcomed by the sun shining through your balcony window and the sound of the ocean slowly humming in the background
BEACHWe are beach people
We have had this type room in the past the rooms are on the end of the Luna Sol towers directly face the ocean and enjoy this type of room

The Cevicheria offers sea food and drinks depends on the occupancy at 1230 pm they set up a grill by the pool they serve either pork beef chicken or fish which goes so quick make sure you are close by to get someThey will re open the restaurant by the pool bar by December the 10th that will be the Asian restaurant for dinner and open for lunch as it used to be
Activities at the pool hourly for bulk of the day beach vbal and soccer and then a nightly show at 9 pm
If you want a good view of the ocean ask for a room in Sea Tower 7th Floor
It would always be less busy than the main buffet Kalmia and you can see and hear the ocean waves which was super peaceful
Beach towel are free of charge and can be changed at any time
We did pay the extra for the full ocean view and to us that was well worth it
That problem is no longer evident and the sand and ocean were beautiful
The ocean had rough surf making it hard to go out far
The Colour of the sea which is not their merit
